English
Blue Family is a suspenseful drama inspired by actual events which tells the story
of a man who over the course of two years kidnaps three women and keeps them locked
in his basement for several more years. It gives an inside look at the double life of
a man whose depths of darkness are revealed behind closed doors, along with the
stories of three women willing to do anything in order to get back to their families.
